attributes.action: change the benefit system which currently allows mothers to leave the family home and effectivly keep income support under joint residence orders of 50 / 50    60 / 40   70 /30 and so on they should automatically be made to claim jobseekers allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think it is very unhelpful that for a goverment that says it wants to keep familys together allows for the benefit system to do the opposite when certain young mothers think they are better off walking out on there familys i obtained a joint residence of my daughter of 7 at the time on a 50 / 50 basis to my shock her mother was able to run about claiming income support doing absolutley nothing to find work whilst i had to jump through all sorts of hoops on jobseekers allowance and balance the care of my daughter as well
